and.name: Game
and.description: Game is an Entity and the object of the collection. Represents generic Information regarding Games.

feature.name: Title
feature.description: Title of the game.

feature.name: Publisher
feature.description: Publisher of the game.

feature.name: Category
feature.description: Category which fits the game. For Example: RPG in case of Skyrim.

feature.name: Played
feature.description: Has the person already played the game?

feature.name: TimePlayed
feature.description: Holds the total play time.

feature.name: Finished
feature.description: Has the person finished the game?

feature.name: Rating
feature.description: The rating of the game, by the person administering the collection.

feature.name: ReleaseDate
feature.description: At which date was the game released?

and.name: Useful Links
and.description: Collection of useful links regarding the game. Links in this context represent paths in the file system as well as links in terms of URLs.

feature.name: .Exe
feature.description: File system path pointing at the executable.

feature.name: Updater
feature.description: File system path pointing at the updater.

feature.name: Steam
feature.description: URL for the steampage of the game. If it exists.

feature.name: Support
feature.description: URL leading to the support page for the game.

and.name: Platform
and.description: For which platforms is this game available?

feature.name: Windows
feature.description: Represents the platform Windows

feature.name: XBOX
feature.description: Represents the platform XBOX

feature.name: Playstation
feature.description: Represents the platform Playstation

feature.name: GUI
feature.description: Graphical User Interface. Representation of the GameAdministration in an GUI.

alt.name: Sort
alt.description: Sorts the collection in relation to an Information like title.

feature.name: ByTitle
feature.description: Sorts the collection by title, alphabetical.

feature.name: ByRating
feature.description: Sorts the collection by rating.

feature.name: ByCategory
feature.description: Sorts the collection by category, alphabetical.

feature.name: ByPublisher
feature.description: Sorts the collection by publisher, alphabetical.

feature.name: ByPlatform
feature.description: Sorts the collection by platform, grouped by platform and alphabetical.

feature.name: Search
feature.description: Allows text search inside the Collection

and.name: API
and.description: Encompases the ways to interact with the collection from within the bounds of the program.

feature.name: Add
feature.description: Adds an game to the collection.

feature.name: Delete
feature.description: Deletes a game from the collection.

feature.name: Get
feature.description: Returns the Collection

feature.name: Update
feature.description: Allows the update of the information regarding a game of the collection.

and.name: Datasource
and.description: Desribes the interaction with a source outside of the bounds of the program.

and.name: Save
and.description: Encompasses the ways to save the collection.

feature.name: PDF
feature.description: Saves Collection as a pdf

feature.name: TXT
feature.description: Saves Collection as a txt

and.name: Load
and.description: Encompasses the ways to load a collection.

feature.name: .TXT
feature.description: Loads a collextion from a txt

feature.name: Pastebin
feature.description: Loads a collection from a pastebin URL

feature.name: GetRecommendations
feature.description: Gather recommendations for games in relation to the users interests.

feature.name: AddRecommendation
feature.description: Give another person a recommendation for a game
